Subject: Disable tamper protection
Description:
Hello,
We have a question:
Can tamper protection be forcibly disabled from the windows registry?
Best regards.
What_We_Know__c:
- the customer asked the epp client can be stopped from the windows registry
- told them that this is not possible, and it can't be stopped from services either
Next_Steps__c: waiting on further questions or closure
